data.text: Same old victim mentality with the covid crank cult. That logical question was asking why a teenager who had sod all to do with them was wearing a mask and people rightly told them it was CREEPY and they should mind their own business. #leaveourkidsalone  #detoxtwitter #BeKind https://t.co/uL3zhgN6S6

@caistercampAnne It's just weird that the antimaskers spent so bloody long asking others to mind their own business and now they won't mind their own business as to why people are wearing a mask. It's almost like they were lying about being all for freedom of choice after all... #hypocrites
@CTWhite80 @SherlocksSpring I do the same, especially if it's cold.

@SherlocksSpring I left mine on as I wandered through the city yesterday - partly to keep my face warm but mostly cos it was easier than taking it off and popping it on again 2 mins later with stuff in my hands!
